title: Smart Data Models - AsynchronousMachine
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A rotating machine whose shaft rotates asynchronously with the electrical field.  Also known as an induction machine with no external connection to the rotor windings, e.g squirrel-cage induction machine.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be AsynchronousMachine

AsynchronousMachineDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Asynchronous machine dynamics model used to describe dynamic behavior of this asynchronous machine. Default: None

asynchronousMachineType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates the type of Asynchronous Machine (motor or generator). Default: None

converterFedDrive.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates whether the machine is a converter fed drive. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: False

efficiency.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Efficiency of the asynchronous machine at nominal operation in percent. Indicator for converter drive motors. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

iaIrRatio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ratio of locked-rotor current to the rated current of the motor (Ia/Ir). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

nominalFrequency.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nameplate data indicates if the machine is 50 or 60 Hz. Default: 0.0

nominalSpeed.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nameplate data.  Depends on the slip and number of pole pairs. Default: 0.0

polePairNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Number of pole pairs of stator. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0

ratedMechanicalPower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rated mechanical power (Pr in the IEC 60909-0). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909. Default: 0.0

reversible.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates for converter drive motors if the power can be reversible. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: False

rxLockedRotorRatio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Locked rotor ratio (R/X). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0
